caption: Two men sit inside a car when a portly man approaches, waving at them through the window. He doesn't seem very friendly, but the two men in the car, both dressed in black, don't appear provoked. They then proceed to enter a hospital. Many people greet them warmly, and they seem very pleased. They converse animatedly. The man dressed in black seems to be accusing or pointing out something, but it appears that no one around believes him. He looks quite shocked. Following this, they go into a room – a hospital room – where the three of them discuss something with very serious expressions.
